job description:
Data Scientist
If you are a Ph. D, Data Scientist with Ad-Tech experience, please read on!

Based in beautiful Santa Monica, California we are a cutting edge video ad-tech company who is obsessed with data and equally obsessed with ensuring a work culture of fulfillment, engagement, and high performance. We are backed by 8 top venture capital firms which contribute to our rapidly growing 100+ person startup. Right now, we are looking for a few Data Scientists to join the team. Your work will directly influence the the tools we're building such as audience behavior prediction, forecasting, and allocation.

Top Reasons to Work with Us
  • $150,000 to $200,000 DOE
  • 100% Covered Cost for Relocation to Santa Monica
  • Based in beautiful Santa Monica, California
  • Stock Options
  • Amazing Work Culture (Inc. Magazine's Best Workplaces 2018)
What You Will Be Doing
  • Build and scale models to support audience segmentation.
  • Analyze Peta-Byte scale data sets in Video and TV audiences.
  • Coordinate and collaborate with engineering teams
What You Need for this Position
  • Ad Tech experience is a MUST
  • Python
  • R
  • SQL
  • Machine Learning
  • Julia
Big Pluses
  • Apache Spark
  • Experience with time series analysis such as ARIMA, LSTMs, Etc...
What's In It for You
  • $150,000 to $190,000 DOE
  • 100% Covered Cost for Relocation to Santa Monica
  • Based in beautiful Santa Monica, California
  • Stock Options
  • Amazing Work Culture (Inc. Magazine's Best Workplaces 2018)
So, if you are a Data Scientist with experience, please apply today!
  • Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.

    CyberCoders, Inc is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer
All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.

Your Right to Work In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.
